Recurrent Childhood Liver Cancer
		                    Treatment of recurrent hepatoblastoma may include the following:         -  Surgery to remove isolated (single and separate) metastatic tumors with or without chemotherapy.    -  Combination chemotherapy.    -  Liver transplant.    -  Ablation therapy (radiofrequency ablation or percutaneous ethanol injection).    - A clinical trial of a new treatment.
